Tested Cases: Verify if the Live UI is exactly match with Figma UI
Validate the Data response from the backend

Bugs Reported.Description: The Admin Dashboard in the Figma design contains three articles, Whereas the Live UI displays four articles, indicating a mismatch between the Live UI and the Figma design.
There is a spelling inconsistency in the admin dashboard module names: the Figma design uses 'Clients', Whereas the Live UI uses 'Client.
The  contributor names of articles within in the admin dashboard of Figma design do not correspond with the contributor names within the Live UI of the articles.

Bugs Reported.ScreenShots: Please find the attached screenshots illustating the articles within both the Figma design and the Live UI. Additionally, These screenshots address the identified spelling inconsistency of the client module in the admin dashboard and the variance in contributor names of the articles. All of these screenshots are conveniently located in the Testing folder for

Fixes to be Done.Description: Please send the proper response from the backend.
UI alignment can be polished more to improve appearance.

Testing Feedback: The Admin Dashboard component has been tested and found to be working well with minor issues. The UI is not responsive and the data is not correctly retrieved from the backend. However, some bugs were identified and reported, such as  missmatch content between the Figma design and Live UI, and the missing admin image and the use of static data. The fixes for these bugs have been identified and will be implemented in the next iteration.
Performance: Good, but there is scope for improving the quality of the code.
